content.rendered:
Directed by Abhishek Pathak

Written by Danish Singh. Raj B. Shetty

Cast Sunny Singh (Chaman Kohli). Maanvi Gagroo (Apsara). Karishma Sharma (Aaina). Gagan Arora (Goldy). Atul Kumar (Shashi Kohli). Grusha Kapoor (Sushma Kohli). Rajendra Chawla (Apsara’s Father). Suparna Marwah (Apsara’s Mother). Aishwarya Sakhuja (Ekta Mam). Sharib Hashmi (Peon). Saurabh Shukla (Pandit Ji). Satish Sharma (Principal). Pankhuri Gidwani (Reema). Gurpal Singh (Sodhi Uncle). Jaspal Kaur (Sodhi Aunty). Abhilash Chaudhary (Rathee). Vidushi Kaul (Shikha). Vikram (Gaurav). Himanshu Sharma (Chaman’s Friend). Keshav (Apsara’s Boyfriend). Sukhanshu Chaterjee (Girl’s Father). Nirupama Verma (Girl’s Mother). Priya Dora (Wedding Alliance Girl). Ankit (Gang Boy 1). Sameer (Gang Boy 2). Aakash (Gang Boy 3). Anmol (Gang Boy 4). Samridhi Chandola (Renu Madam). Diksha Rajput (Teacher 2). Jyoti (Maid). Susheel Sharma (Joginder Uncle). Vandana Chopra (Bua). Sanjeev (Uncle 1). Rajni (Aunty 1). Manoj Bakshi (Dr. Arora). Bhaskar Pant (Doctor). Desh Raj (Old Patient). Shafi (Ward Boy) . Abhilasha Poul (Peon’s Wife). Sankalp Gupta (Student (uncredited)). Dharmendra Singh Gurjar (Dharam (uncredited)). Anushka Kaushik (Apsara’s Sister (uncredited)). Guru Randhawa (Party Singer (uncredited)). Aruna Soni (Neighbour (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Murli Chhatwani. Aditya Chowksey. Sanjeev Joshi. Ashish Kathpal. Arradhya Maan. Abhishek Pathak. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Ravi Sarin. Avinash Shah. Vignesh Shetty. Shreya Dev Verma. Sheetal Singh Yaduvanshi

Production Panorama Studio
